Rautoml 1.0.0.0
  • Reference

    Custom Scatter Plot Function

    custom_scatterplot.Rd

    Generates a customized scatter plot with optional smoothing, color grouping, and shape differentiation.

    custom_scatterplot(
  df,
  xvar,
  yvar,
  colorVar = NULL,
  line_size = 0.9,
  addsmooth = "none",
  seval = TRUE,
  addshape = TRUE,
  shapes = 1,
  plot_title = NULL,
  xlab = NULL,
  ylab = NULL,
  title_pos = 0.5,
  title_size = 25,
  default_col = "#0077B6",
  axis_title_size = 20,
  axis_text_size = 16,
  axistext_angle = 0,
  legend_title = "",
  confelev = 0.95,
  colorbrewer = "Dark2"
)

    Arguments

    df

    Data frame containing the variables for plotting.

    xvar

    Name of the x-axis variable.

    yvar

    Name of the y-axis variable.

    colorVar

    Optional variable for coloring points.

    line_size

    Numeric value for point size and line width.

    addsmooth

    String specifying smoothing method (e.g., "lm", "loess").

    seval

    Logical; whether to show confidence interval.

    addshape

    Logical; whether to differentiate points by shape.

    shapes

    Numeric value specifying point shape.

    plot_title

    Optional title of the plot.

    xlab

    Label for x-axis.

    ylab

    Label for y-axis.

    title_pos

    Numeric value for title position.

    title_size

    Numeric value for title size.

    default_col

    Default color for points.

    axis_title_size

    Numeric value for axis title size.

    axis_text_size

    Numeric value for axis text size.

    axistext_angle

    Numeric value for x-axis text angle.

    legend_title

    Optional title for the legend.

    confelev

    Confidence level for smoothing confidence interval.

    colorbrewer

    Color palette for grouped variables.

    Value

    A ggplot2 object representing the scatter plot.

    Examples

    scatterplot_custom(df, "mpg", "hp", colorVar = "cyl", addsmooth = "lm")
#> Error in scatterplot_custom(df, "mpg", "hp", colorVar = "cyl", addsmooth = "lm"): could not find function "scatterplot_custom"
